overview: Notorious beauty Bettie Page and other sexy pinups star in this collection of 8 mm shorts produced by photographer Irving Klaw (aka "the King of Pinups") between 1951 and 1956. Highlights include a pair of rare catfight films featuring glamorous women wrestling in lingerie; a series of fetish films involving high heels, black stockings and black gloves; and a collection of provocative burlesque-style dances.
title: The Irving Klaw Classics
